name: Mini Sonic's Ultimate Scratch Collection
description:
Welcome to a little game I call.. MINI SONIC'S ULTIMATE SCRATCH COLLECTION!

If you don't know what Mini Sonic is, it's a small collection of games I've made. This game is also a compilation of other games created on Scratch. And before you ask,  yes. I got permission from all the game developers to add in their games. And the list of these games are..

  • Mini Sonic and the Monster Within
  • Mini Sonic and the Emerald Ring  (Don't Play it, it's cringe)
  • Endless Nights at Freddy's
  • Space Mice
  • Space Mice 2
  • Paper Worlds 3
  • Kevin and Friends

You can also play this game here on: Gamejolt

A mighty fine line of games if I do say so myself.
